reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made, stylish, and appreciate its thick, 100% cotton fabric. They describe it as super soft and comfortable, with one customer noting it accentuates the wearer's silhouette. The dress runs true to size and has a relaxed fit, though some find it runs a little snug around the bust. The length receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, good quality for the price
items.body: This is super cute, actually good quality for Amazon clothing. It’s 100% cotton but I washed and dried on cold and it still fit fine after washing. The belt hits at a flattering spot. Makes a cute casual outfit with tights and boots. I did have to use a piece of fashion tape in between the buttons at the bust to prevent gaping but that is an easy fix! If I was any taller I think it would feel too short to be a dress, but for me at 5’4” it is the perfect length. Read more
items.author: elizzy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and pretty blue
items.body: It's a versatile and comfortable addition to my wardrobe. It's design seamlessly blends style and functionality, making it suitable for various occasions. The dress has a flattering fit, accentuating the wearer's silhouette while providing ample freedom of movement. It does feel soft to the skin. Whether you're heading to a casual outing or a relaxed evening event, this dress is a reliable choice for both comfort and fashion. Read more
items.author: Christine D

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Legendary Whitetails womens Open Spaces Dress
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress! Very good material. The length is perfect. Just runs small. I’m 5’1 195lbs and I ordered an XL and it was tight . I had to reorder it in a bigger size . I went off the measurements. And that’s what I typically wear. They are off . The XL is more like a Large. Read more
items.author: Abbie Singletary

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable Dress for Any Occasion!
items.body: The Legendary Whitetails Women's Open Spaces Dress is a wonderful addition to any wardrobe. This dress combines comfort with style, making it perfect for various occasions, from casual outings to more dressed-up events. Pros: Comfortable Fit: Made from soft, breathable fabric that feels great against the skin and allows for easy movement. Versatile Style: The simple yet elegant design makes it suitable for a wide range of events, from casual to semi-formal. Flattering Design: The cut of the dress is flattering on many body types, enhancing natural curves. Quality Material: Well-made with high-quality materials that ensure durability and long-lasting wear. Cons: Sizing: Runs slightly large, so consider ordering a size down for a better fit. Limited Color Options: More color choices would be a great addition to the line. Wrinkling: The fabric can wrinkle easily, so it might require ironing or steaming before wear. Overall, the Legendary Whitetails Women's Open Spaces Dress is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a versatile, stylish, and comfortable dress. It's perfect for a variety of occasions and is sure to become a favorite in your wardrobe. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Shiva Pgn

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT AMERICAN SOFT COTTON FLANNEL , FITS WAY TO SMALL.
items.body: 2 sizes TO SMALL IN BUST WAIST HIP BACK SLEEVE. For USA SIZE CHART!! VERY SMALL BUTTONS FOR DRESS, NOT TRUSTED!! ***NOT SOFT AMERICAN COTTON FLANNEL, VERY SCRATCHY FABRIC*** A VERY SCRATCHY JEAN LIKE MATERIAL INSIDE AROUND NECK CUFFS BUTTON UP AREAS.....WORST!! ***INSTEAD OF RETURN ( COST OF SEWING PATTERN THESE DAYS ) I USED THIS DRESS AS A PATTERN COPYIED ON TISSUE PAPPER ALTERNATIVELY TO MY SIZE AND MY TRUE FIT WITH AMERICAN SOFT COTTON ACTUALLY USA FLANNEL*** I DO NOT RECOMMEND NOT USA FABRIC SCRATCHY ACTATE FABRIC ""IF YOU SEW YOU KNOW"" Read more
items.author: NONAME

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: This dress is super great quality but is made of flannel and quite warm for a Texas summer. Amazon said a medium would fit me and that the sizing runs normal. However I wish I had returned it for a large. I bought it to wear to work but I feel like the medium fits too sexy for work but my husband disagrees and thinks it fits fine. I’m 5”2, 140lbs, C cup, and I wish I would have returned it for a large. The medium does fit but I feel like it fits too sexy Read more
items.author: roxaphi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall print!
items.body: I wore this dress for family pictures this fall. I originally ordered a size XXL and it was too big so I order the Xl. I am 5’7” and 190 lbs. the xl fit me perfectly. The length and the thickness was just right, as well as the color scheme in the flannel. There is also a small belt that comes with it so you can make the waistline smaller if needed! Read more
items.author: Charlie Ann McCuistion

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stylish Concept, but Poor Fit
items.body: I ordered this in a medium, which was the recommended size, but found it too tight in the chest, so the fit wasn’t right for me. The length and material were fine, but I felt it was overpriced for what is essentially an oversized flannel shirt with a belt. I liked the idea of the look, but unfortunately, it didn’t work out for me, so I ended up returning it. Read more
items.author: Paula L.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Medium Denim Wash, Navy Army Plaid, Frost Plaid, Pacific Navy Plaid, Holly Berry, Pumpkin Spice. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
